DOWNLOAD THE ULTIMATE BATTLESHIP GAME HERE!

Instructions

  1. Download the battleship zip package from the link above
  2. Unzip the package using WinZip/Tar or similar softwares
  3. Open the extracted directory and enter into the bin directory

Instruction for Linux

  1. Run following in a terminal ./Battleship.Ascii/bin/Release/netcoreapp3.1/linux-x64/publish/Battleship.Ascii

Instruction for Windows (NOT READY)

  1. Double click on ./Battleship.Ascii/bin/Release/netcoreapp3.1/win-x64/publish/Battleship.Ascii.exe

Instruction for Mac (NOT READY)

  1. Run following in a terminal ./Battleship.Ascii/bin/Release/netcoreapp3.1/osx-x64/publish/Battleship.Ascii
